column5: It's been a while since I've posted a report, but that doesnt mean I havent been busy.  I've had a few guides this past week and a half. I had an excellent day on Cooks Bay last week so I've been focusing a lot out there as I've been on them good every day for the last week now.  Most of my success has come flippin pads and cane using jigs and "power-shotting" Strike Zone Slammers and DartWorms. My dad and I had a good day fishing a small Muskoka lake and I reunited with an old friend for a day on Balsam Lake today!  Here's the fish porn!        smallie on Simcoe..flippin the cane.  First time for everything
beauty hawgs
Great fish, nice work!
Holy bleep, Steve...you are definitely a "hawg master"!  Nicely done, as usual!
Some real nice pigs. Great job Steve
awesome looking fish...
thanks to everyone for reading and replying.  The fishing season is just heating up!  I live for fall fishing!
Great report, and nice fish porn.
nice.  Some real pigs there. well done
Great report and pics Steve Some real nice hawgs you got into.... congrats Leechman
Impressive, those Bass are very impressive!
this's awesome.
Great stuff Steve love those hawgs! Can't wait to get out soon!
definately some fatties good worrk!
beauty fish steve. what rod is that in the 4th pick? jw
Some good fishing there Steve. Keep it up.
awesome fish , thanks for the pics
Nice hawgs Steve!
Browning Midas 7'6XH Flippin Stick.  I love it
Nice largies!
Yep ..  A Serious amount of Hawgs right there...
Good shooting!!
